resources.string: Tap the counter to start a workout
Tap the counter to pause\n\nHold down the counter to finish set
Tap the counter to resume\n\nHold down the counter to finish set
Tap the counter to start a new set\n\nHold down the counter to reset workout
This feature provides anonymous information which will improve user experience and help uncover bugs. Please help the developer by enabling this function.
